retention.note: Configurable policies but no guaranteed short-term deletion, 30-day post-removal deletion only applies to user-initiated deletions

encryption.note: AES-256 encryption at rest, TLS 1.2+ in transit, comprehensive encryption standards

geographic.note: Enterprise data residency in controlled regions with some geographic flexibility

sharing.note: Complete data isolation in enterprise tier, no third-party sharing

training.note: Aero data retention (ZDR) available with contractual guarantee data never used for model training

admin.note: Comprehensive enterprise admin controls, workspace management, user provisioning, role-based access

audit.note: Detailed usage logging, conversation history, activity monitoring dashboard

integration.note: Enterprise SSO with SAML/OIDC support, limited API integration

violations.note: SOC 2 Type 1 certified progressing to Type 2, but CRITICAL GAP: OpenAI does not offer HIPAA Business Associate Agreements for ChatGPT Enterprise, creating major compliance barriers for healthcare, legal, and financial services handling regulated data

transparency.note: Comprehensive enterprise policies, dedicated trust portal, clear data processing documentation

score.note: Excellent enterprise documentation, responsive support, detailed trust and safety portal

details.dataStorage: Geographic: enterprise data residency in controlled regions. Encryption: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.2+ in transit. Retention: configurable policies but no guaranteed short-term deletion.
details.trainingUsage: Training: zero data retention (ZDR) available. Sharing: complete data isolation.
details.accessControls: Admin: Comprehensive enterprise admin controls. Audit: detailed usage logging. Integration: enterprise SSO with SAML/OIDC support.
details.complianceRisk: Violations: OpenAI does not offer HIPAA BAAs for ChatGPT Enterprise. Transparency: comprehensive enterprise policies.
details.vendorTransparency: Excellent enterprise documentation, responsive support, detailed trust and safety portal.

retention.note: Indefinite data retention by default unless user manually deletes conversations. Recent court order requires indefinite retention of all data including deleted content.

encryption.note: Standard encryption in transit and at rest documented, but not customer-controlled encryption and limited encryption specifications published.

geographic.note: Data stored in known secure regions (US) with some contractual protections, but exact locations not specified for free tier.

sharing.note: Limited sharing with clear disclosure in privacy policy, primarily for safety and compliance purposes.

training.note: Data used for training by default, but opt-out available through settings or privacy portal. However, training opt-out still retains data indefinitely.

admin.note: Free tier provides no organizational visibility or centralized management - individual accounts only.

audit.note: No audit capabilities available for free tier users - no activity logs or usage tracking accessible to administrators.

integration.note: Username/password authentication only - no SSO, SCIM provisioning, or enterprise identity management integration available.

violations.note: Basic compliance certifications present and privacy policy generally compliant with major regulations, though lacks specialized enterprise compliance features.

transparency.note: General data processing described with retention periods stated, though some third-party relationships and exact processing locations could be clearer.

score.note: Clear privacy policy with basic security documentation available. Support available but can be slower for free tier users. Regular transparency reports not consistently published.

details.dataStorage: Geographic: US-based with some international infrastructure but good contractual protections | Encryption: Standard TLS and AES encryption documented but not customer-controlled | Retention: Indefinite retention by default, user can delete but recent court order may override deletions
details.trainingUsage: Training: Used by default for model training but opt-out available through settings or privacy portal | Sharing: Limited third-party sharing primarily for safety/compliance with clear disclosure
details.accessControls: Admin: No organizational controls for free tier - individual accounts only | Audit: No audit logs or activity tracking available | Integration: Basic username/password only, no enterprise identity integration
details.complianceRisk: Violations: Basic certifications present, generally compliant privacy policy | Transparency: Good general documentation though some processing details could be clearer
details.vendorTransparency: Clear privacy policy and basic security documentation available, support responsive but prioritizes paid users
